languages.text: "Во имя Золотого Трона живем и умираем, дабы охранить свет Его от тьмы истребляющей..."

traits.locale_text: [Draft] Во имя Золотого Трона храни и укрепляй нас, сражающихся ради Тебя.

languages.text: "In the name of the Golden Throne we live and die so we that we may protect His light from the obliterating darkness..."
languages.original_text: "Во имя Золотого Трона живем и умираем, дабы охранить свет Его от тьмы истребляющей..."

traits.locale_text: "In the name of the Golden Throne we live and die so we that we may protect His light from the obliterating darkness..."
"In the name of the Golden Throne we live and die so we that we may protect His light from the obliterating darkness..."
"In the name of the Golden Throne we live and die so we that we may protect His light from the obliterating darkness..."

languages.text: “我们以黄金王座的名义生存，死亡。愿我们守护祂的明光，不要让它湮没在黑暗之中……”
languages.original_text: "In the name of the Golden Throne we live and die so we that we may protect His light from the obliterating darkness..."

traits.locale_text: “我们以黄金王座的名义生存，死亡。愿我们守护祂的明光，不要让它湮没在黑暗之中……”

languages.text: «En el nombre del Trono Dorado vivimos y morimos para proteger su luz de la oscuridad aniquiladora...».
languages.original_text: "In the name of the Golden Throne we live and die so we that we may protect His light from the obliterating darkness..."

traits.locale_text: «En el nombre del Trono Dorado vivimos y morimos para proteger su luz de la oscuridad aniquiladora...».

languages.text: 「黄金の玉座の名の下に、我々は生き、そして死んでいきます。そうして、破滅の闇から主の光をお守りするのです…」
languages.original_text: "In the name of the Golden Throne we live and die so we that we may protect His light from the obliterating darkness..."

traits.locale_text: 「黄金の玉座の名の下に、我々は生き、そして死んでいきます。そうして、破滅の闇から主の光をお守りするのです…」

languages.text: "Wir leben und sterben im Namen des Goldenen Throns, um Sein Licht vor der vernichtenden Finsternis zu schützen ..."
languages.original_text: "In the name of the Golden Throne we live and die so we that we may protect His light from the obliterating darkness..."

traits.locale_text: "Wir leben und sterben im Namen des Goldenen Throns, um Sein Licht vor der vernichtenden Finsternis zu schützen ..."

languages.text: « Au nom du Trône d'Or, nous vivons et mourrons dans le but de protéger Sa lumière des ténèbres qui la menacent... »
languages.original_text: "In the name of the Golden Throne we live and die so we that we may protect His light from the obliterating darkness..."

traits.locale_text: « Au nom du Trône d'Or, nous vivons et mourrons dans le but de protéger Sa lumière des ténèbres qui la menacent... »

languages.text: "Altın Taht'ın adıyla yaşarız ve ölürüz. Arzumuz O'nun ışığını karanlığın yok ediciliğinden korumaktır."
languages.original_text: "In the name of the Golden Throne we live and die so we that we may protect His light from the obliterating darkness..."
